name: Verify a phone number from a Google Sheets row using Veriphone
description:
Every time a phone number is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row, Make will automatically verify it in Veriphone and update the row with data of your choice.

The template uses [this spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18QXxDXbnheSLVJANN_QTjamN8E4gfuHO5VDWxg6OHMY/edit?usp=sharing).
